On 8/5/13 2:19 AM, system.nikhil wrote:
> I have a requirement in which I want to provide Chrome user agent.
>
> I can change the user agent using the below bean property
> <property name="userAgentTemplate"
>           value="Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; heritrix/@VERSION@ +@OPERATOR_CONTACT_URL@)"/>
>
> The problem is that it takes the operator contact url, but my requirement is that I do not want to specify the operator contact url.
>
> Can this be possible?
> If yes how?

Even if you're simulating a Chrome-like User-Agent with most of that 
string, you should still append contact information so that affected 
websites can contact you if your automated crawl creates problems.

The configuration validation done by Heritrix enforces this good 
practice, and there's no configuration support for disabling it.

- Gordon
